comments:
This is from Eclipse 3.2RC1

After a failure to build the workbench, I was told to look at the Error Log, wherupon I received the following Exception:

I couldn't replicate this exception using RC1.  Does the view fail to open?  If not, can you provide a screenshot of it?

Wassim, Janek - have you guys seen this one?  I can't seem to replicate it (I haven't tried on Mac, only Windows, but I would think this is not a platform-specific problem).  There could be something here due to the changes to ViewerSorter and StructuredViewer.

Paul, does the view fail to open?  If not, can you provide a screen capture?
Sadly, it is not reproduceable for me either :-\  I was able to view the Error log at a later date (IIRC I had restarted eclipse)
Had you changed the view's sort criteria (by date, plugin, message)?  That could make a difference.
Paul, I am going to close this one for now.  If you experience it again, reopen this bug.

Yes, it's actually the date thats causing a problem.  A potential culprit would be a currupt log file with a malformed date.

Let's see what we can do

It looks like I had a mid air collision with my last comment.

We recently modified the way the log view sorts by date (Bug 135633) - ill put in an NPE guard and fix it up.
Thanks for looking at this, Janek.  I am going to assign this one to you.
I am really glad that this is fixed, and am super impressed that you were able to do so. I know that I would have been stuck trying to reproduce it!
